data.blankContent: To boost sales during the slow post-Christmas season, Nintendo and General Mills worked together on a promotional campaign that appeared in early 1999. The ____ by Saatchi ____ Saatchi, New York began ____ January 25 and ____ children ____ buy Fruit ____ the Foot ____ for ____ to ____ them ____ their Nintendo 64 ____. Ninety different tips were available, with three variations of thirty tips each.
data.partBlankContent: To boost sales during the slow post-Christmas season, Nintendo and General Mills worked together on a promotional campaign that appeared in early 1999. The advert_______ by Saatchi a__ Saatchi, New York began o_ January 25 and encou_____ children t_ buy Fruit b_ the Foot sna___ for ti__ to he__ them wi__ their Nintendo 64 ga___. Ninety different tips were available, with three variations of thirty tips each.
data.answer: 为了在圣诞节后的淡季里提高销量，任天堂和通用磨坊公司在1999年初合作开展了一场促销活动。这则广告由盛世长城和纽约盛世长城公司于1月25日发起，广告鼓励孩子们购买Fruit by The Foot零食，以获得帮助他们玩任天堂64位游戏的窍门。有90种不同的技巧可供选择，每三种有30种不同的变化。
